replies.bodyText:
Actually I have imported java-google-style.xml in the root dir before formating this file.Maybe the old format is not suitable in java-google-style.xml. As you can see, the default hard warp is 100.

If you put them on one line, the code on the right will exceed the hard limit.
replies.author: LebronAl

replies.bodyText: You can rename the createMultiTimeSeriesPlan to a shorter one. It's soooo ugly now.
replies.author: Alima777
